02 Nov 2019, 14:54 by Danang Sundoro



Sah, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, Ini Tanggapan Kemenpora



Sah, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, Ini Tanggapan Kemenpora



Sah, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, Ini Tanggapan Kemenpora


KBRN, Jakarta : Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga (Kemenpora) memberikan pernyataan resmi terkait terpilihnya Mochamad Iriawan sebagai ketua umum PSSI periode 2019-2023 dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-la, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019) siang WIB.Mochamad Iriawan atau akrab disapa Iwan Bule, seorang perwira tinggi Polri yang juga sebagai sekretaris utama Lembaga Ketahanan Nasional (Lemhannas) mampu meraih 82 dari total 86 suara dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB). Tercatat, tiga suara lain dinyatakan tidak sah, sedangkan satu voter tidak memberikan suara. KLB PSSI yang disaksikan langsung oleh perwakilan dari FIFA dan AFC serta disaksikan menpora bersama para voters ini harus menghasilkan pembenahan sepakbola Indonesia yang lebih baik kedepannya. Sesmenpora, Gatot Dewa S. Broto berharap terpilihnya Iwan Bule sebagai ketua umum PSSI bersama pasangannya, cucu Sumantri sebagai wakil ketua umum PSSI dapat segera bergerak untuk membenahi prestasi sepak bola di dinegeri ini."Kemenpora berharap terpilihnya Iwan Bule sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI dan Iwan Budianto dengan Cucu Sumantri sebagai Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI, dapat segera tancap gas poll, karena dalam sambutan Menpora disebutkan di antaranya bahwa Presiden Jokowi sangat berpesan agar Pengurus PSSI segera bergerak cepat mempersiapkan Timnas.  Selain itu, Kemenpora membuka pintu lebar-lebar bagi Pengurus PSSI untuk bekerja lebih cepat dan komprehensif bagi kemajuan sepakbola nasional," ujar Gatot S.Dewa Broto dalam keterangan tertulis yang diterima Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI) dan awak media, usai KLB PSSI, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Berikut secara lengkap Kemenpora menanggapi pemilihan Ketua Umum PSSI :1. Pada pagi hari ini sekitar jam 09.30, Menpora Zainudin Amali telah secara resmi membuka Kongres Luar Biasa PSSI di suatu hotel di Jakarta. Dalam pembukaan melalui pemukulan gong tersebut, Menpora didampingi oleh Plt Ketum PSSI Iwan Budianto, Ketua Umum KONI Marciano, Ketua Umum NOC Indonesia Raja Sapta Oktohari, dan Luca Nicola (Head of Member Association Governance Services on Secretary General of FIFA). 2. Usai pembukaan KLB PSSI, langsung diikuti dengan proses pemilihan  Calon Ketua Umum PSSI. Menurut informasi, sebelum dilakukannya pemungutan suara, sempat terjadi situasi konflik yang sangat memanas, dan berakibat Walk Out oleh beberapa Calon Ketua Umum PSSI yang merasa kecewa. Terhadap masalah tersebut, Kemenpora tidak dalam kapasitas harus mengambil sikap, karena itu murni masalah internal PSSI. 3. Akhirnya Mochamad Iriawan telah berhasil memperoleh suara sebanyak mengantongi 82 dari total yang seharusnya 86 suara. Tiga suara lain dinyatakan tidak sah, sedangkan satu voter tidak memberikan suara. 4. Terhadap terpilihnya Mochamad Iriawan (yang lebih dikenal dengan sebutan Iwan Bule), Kemenpora menerima sepenuhnya karena sudah menjadi pilihan mayoritas pemilik suara KLB PSSI. Dan lagi proses pemilihan tersebut disaksikan langsung oleh perwakilan FIFA dan AFC serta juga dimonitor langsung oleh Sesmenpora. Bahkan seusai terpilih, Iwan Bule langsung memperoleh ucapan selamat via call langsung dari Presiden FIFA Giani Infantino (yang sedang berada di Bangkok karena sore ini akan bertemu dengan Presiden Jokowi yang sedang menghadiri KTT ASEAN) melalui gadgetnya Sekjen PSSI Ratu Tisha. 5. Selanjutnya diikuti dengan pemilihan Calon Ketua Umum PSSI, yang dimenangkan oleh Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Sumantri.6. Kemenpora berharap terpilihnya Iwan Bule sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI dan Iwan Budianto dengan Cucu Sumantri sebagai Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI, dapat segera tancap gas poll, karena dalam sambutan Menpora disebutkan di antaranya bahwa Presiden Jokowi sangat berpesan agar Pengurus PSSI segera bergerak cepat mempersiapkan Timnas.  Selain itu, Kemenpora membuka pintu lebar-lebar bagi Pengurus PSSI untuk bekerja lebih cepat dan komprehensif bagi kemajuan sepakbola nasional.

Legitimate, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, This Is the Response of the Ministry of Youth and Sports
02 Nov 2019, 14:54 by Danang Sundoro



Legitimate, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, This Is the Response of the Ministry of Youth and Sports



Legitimate, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, This Is the Response of the Ministry of Youth and Sports



Legitimate, Iwan Bule Ketum PSSI 2019-2023, This Is the Response of the Ministry of Youth and Sports


KBRN, Jakarta: The Ministry of Youth and Sports (Kemenpora) gave an official statement related to the election of Mochamad Iriawan as PSSI chairman for the 2019-2023 period in the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-la Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019) ) noon WIB. Mochamad Iriawan or familiarly called Iwan Bule, a high-ranking police officer who is also the main secretary of the National Defense Institute (Lemhannas) was able to win 82 out of a total of 86 votes in the Extraordinary Congress (KLB). Noted, three other votes declared invalid, while one voter did not vote. PSSI KLB which was witnessed directly by representatives from FIFA and AFC and witnessed by the Menpora together with the voters must produce better Indonesian football in the future. Sesmenpora, Gatot Dewa S. Broto hopes that the election of Iwan Bule as PSSI general chairman along with his partner, Sumantri's grandson as PSSI deputy chairman can immediately move to fix football achievements in this country. "Kemenpora hopes that Iwan Bule will be elected as PSSI General Chairperson and Iwan Budianto's grandson with Cucu Sumantri as Deputy Chairperson of PSSI, can immediately step on the gas poll, because in the Minister of Youth and Sport's remarks it was mentioned that President Jokowi strongly advised that the PSSI Management immediately move quickly to prepare the National Team. In addition, Kemenpora opened the door wide open for PSSI Management to work faster and more comprehensive for the progress of national football, "said Gatot S. Dewa Broto in a written statement received by Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI) and the media crew, after KLB PSSI, Saturday (11/02/2019). The following is complete Kemenpora responding to the election of the Chairman of PSSI: 1. On this morning around 09.30, Menpora Zainudin Amali had officially opened the PSSI Extraordinary Congress at a hotel in Jakarta. In the opening ceremony through the beating of the gong, the Minister of Youth and Sports was accompanied by Acting Chairman of PSSI Iwan Budianto, Chairman of KONI Marciano, Chair of Indonesian NOC Raja Sapta Oktohari, and Luca Nicola (Head of Members of the Association of Governance Services on Secretary of FIFA General) 2. After opening the PSSI KLB, immediately followed by the process of selecting the Candidates for PSSI General Chairperson. According to information, prior to the vote, a conflict situation that had become very heated up, resulting in a Walk Out by several PSSI Candidates who were disappointed. Regarding these problems, the Ministry of Youth and Sports is not in a capacity to take a stand, because it is purely an internal PSSI problem. 3. Finally Mochamad Iriawan has succeeded in getting as many votes as pocketing 82 out of a total of 86 votes. Three other votes were declared invalid, while one voter did not vote. 4. Regarding the election of Mochamad Iriawan (better known as Iwan Bule), Kemenpora fully accepts because it has become the majority choice of the PSSI KLB vote holders. And again the selection process was witnessed directly by FIFA and AFC representatives and also monitored directly by Sesmenpora. Even after being elected, Iwan Bule immediately received congratulations via a direct call from FIFA President Giani Infantino (who was in Bangkok because this afternoon will meet with President Jokowi who was attending the ASEAN Summit) through his gadget PSSI Secretary General Ratu Tisha. 5. Then followed by the election of Candidates for the General Chairperson of PSSI, which was won by Iwan Budianto and Cucu Sumantri. The Ministry of Youth and Sports hopes that the election of Iwan Bule as PSSI General Chairperson and Iwan Budianto with Cucu Sumantri as PSSI Deputy Chairperson, can immediately step on the gas poll, because in the Menpora remarks it was mentioned among them that President Jokowi strongly advised PSSI Management to move quickly to prepare the National Team. In addition, the Ministry of Youth and Sports open wide doors for the Management of PSSI to work faster and more comprehensively for the progress of national football.
